returns.amount0: of token 0 expected to be deposited.
returns.amount1: of token 1 expected to be deposited.
returns.mintAmount: amount f shares expected to be minted.

returns.rebalanceParams: payload to send to rebalance function on Arrakis V2 contract.

getAmountsForLiquidity(int24,int24,int24.notice: Exposes Uniswap's getAmountsForLiquidity helper function, returns amount0 and amount1 for a given amount of liquidity.
